title.value: Генетические дистанции между линиями перца сладкого (Capsicum annuum L.), оцененные с использованием RAPD-маркеров, и их связь с гетерозисом
Genetic distance between lines of sweet pepper (Capsicum annuum L.), estimated using RAPD-markers, and its relationship with heterosis

journal.title: Vegetable Growing : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Tarutina, L.A., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Institute of Genetics and Cytology
Shapturenko, M.N., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Institute of Genetics and Cytology
Mishin, L.A., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute for Vegetable Growing
Khotyleva, L.V., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Institute of Genetics and Cytology

abstract.value: RAPD analysis of sweet pepper (Capsicum annuum L.) lines of various eco-geographical origins was made to study DNA screening efficiency for the hybrid breeding in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. Genetic distances among parental lines were calculated. Our collection was classified by UPGMA. Evaluation of line combining ability and the F1 heterosis effect were performed. Positive correlation was found between DNA marker distance of parents and mid parent heterosis for some yield traits, however, their level was low. We aimed to search specific DNA loci, which are positively associated with hybrid performance.
